text: Witold Sobociński (October 15, 1929 - November 19, 2018)Witold Sobocinski at nytimes.com was a Polish cinematographer, academic teacher as well as former jazz musician. He was known for his cinematography works in The Adventures of Gerard, The Hourglass Sanatorium and in Frantic. Sobociński studied at the National Film School in Łódź. He was a member of Melomani, in which he played the drums. Sobociński was born on October 15, 1929 in Łódź, Poland. He died on November 19, 2018 in Łódź at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Polish musicians Category:Jazz musicians Category:Cinematographers Category:People from Łódź
title: Witold Sobociński
